name: Keep it alive (DantonSlip, chakibehappy, Puntarr)
description:
SYNOPSIS:
This is a matter of life and death and how you manage to confronts your fears.

COMMANDS:
ZQSD or ARROWS : Move
SHIFT: Sprint
MOUSE: See aroung
LEFT CLICK: Hug

TEAM MEMBERS:
CHAKI: Programmer & 3D animator | ITCH.IO
DANIEL: Music & SFX  | SOUNDCLOUD
DANTONSLIP: Concept artist, 3D modeler & 3D animator | ITCH.IO
OZAN: 3D modeler & 3D animator | ITCH.IO
